Dead.

Removing the gold from goldsauce while porting this game was a huge mistake, and it'll leave a bad taste in your mouth when you try it.

This version is more borked and broken than Half Life: Source, and that's the main reason it's practically dead. There aren't any players who dare want to taste this sauce.

Go play deathmatch in the original version instead, [b]and learn to never take the gold from goldsauce bruh.[/b]

----- PLEASE READ BEFORE BUYING THIS! -----

This failed game should've been out of store for many years  is no longer functioning and should not be bought. in 2013 this game was entirely ruined with steampipe update. Before I go on, let me define the word "ruined" as it's used in this context. By "ruined" I mean that this game is so properly glitched that you cannot even change your player model anymore! Yeah, that should give you an idea of how much Valve cares for their games.


So yeah, rather buy the normal HL because not only do you get the singleplayer portion of the game with the multiplayer, the online play is still functioning like it should and there is at least a player base. Oh, and if you are planning to buy Half-Life Source which is the other half of this, then don't. It might not be equally broken, but broken enough to make you mad.

Or just get Black Mesa, then you will at least get something that is prettier on the eyes and functioning like it should.
